resources.string: Create your own Mr. X lobby! Invite friends, be Mr. X, and get ready for an exciting game. Start your adventure now!
Join a Mr. X lobby! Play with friends, be the detectives, and dive into the thrilling chase. The adventure awaits!
Please enter a valid first name. The first name cannot be blank.
Please enter a valid last name
Find out what it takes to play the game successfully.
The host thinks of a known person and tells the other players the first letter of the last name of the person. The goal of the players is to figure out which person the host thought of.

The players think of known people whose last name starts with the given letter. They give a hint about the person they thought of. If the host figures out the person, the players do not get anything but if the host cannot figure it out and another player can the players get a barkochba question.
A question's lifecycle within a game

When a player asks a question they give an initial hint about who they thought of. If the host passes any player can answer the question. If the host enters an answer the player who asked the question can either accept an answer and modify the hint to make it more precise or reject the answer and pass the question to the players.
If the players earn a barkochba question the player who asked the question can create a barkochba question which the host has to answer with a yes or a no.
The game ends when a player asks a question and the question's answer is the person that the host thought of.
You are not part of any game yet. Create or join a game to start playing!
There are no questions for this game yet. Ask a question to start the game!
There are no barkochba questions for this game yet. Earn a barkochba question and create it to get information about Mr. X
